t: The Amazon Wildfires Aren't Natural. Blame Humans

t: In A Survey, Amazon Stands Out As Minnesota's Most Trusted Retail Brand
s: And now a new survey from Clarify Capital points out that *this* national retailer (which Minnesota Monthly says is one of the 50 largest employers in Minnesota) now operates 11 different facilities in Minnesota while retaining its title as America's most trusted retail brand.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect and Build Your Brand

t: Amazon Brand Book | Important information for brands on Amazon

t: Brand Fulfilment By Amazon (FBA) pakket | Amazon Advies

t: Duizenden branden in Amazonegebied, wat is er aan de hand?
s: Op dit moment is het brandseizoen in de Amazonegebied. Dit jaar zijn er veel meer branden zijn dan eerdere jaren. Vier vragen over hoe dat komt en welke oplossingen er zijn.
